product_name: The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: Perfect for training when it gets chilly, the women's Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face uses moisture-wicking FlashDryTM fabric for fast drying and great breathability.
short_description: Perfect for training when it gets chilly, the women's Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face uses moisture-wicking FlashDryTM fabric for fast drying and great breathability.
